_source.text: 4) Magnus b Pólvora [Forjando un Idolo] Mangus [3] looked better than last time here and the crowd was behind him.

text: 4) **Magnus** b **Pólvora** [Forjando un Idolo] Mangus [3] looked **better** **than** last time here and the crowd was behind him.

_source.text: After being a Horsemen for nearly a year, Lex Luger knew better than anyone else that no one got a fair shake when dealing with Ric Flair.

text: After being a Horsemen for nearly a year, **Lex** **Luger** knew **better** **than** anyone else that no one got a fair shake when dealing with **Ric** **Flair**.
